{"id":1051425050,"question_id":3095,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1694919612,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1051425050/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Number of Alloys","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxNumberOfAlloys(int n, int k, int budget, List<List<Integer>> composition, List<Integer> stock, List<Integer> cost) {\n        \n        int alloys=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<k; i++){\n            \n            int cnt =0;\n            List<Integer> com = composition.get(i);\n            List<Integer> sto = new ArrayList<>(stock);\n            \n            int consume = getConsume(com, sto, cost);\n            \n            int b = budget;\n            \n            while(b-consume>=0){\n                cnt++;\n                b-=consume;\n                consume = getConsume(com, sto, cost);\n            }\n            \n            alloys = Math.max(alloys, cnt);\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        return alloys;\n        \n    }\n    \n    private int getConsume(List<Integer> com ,List<Integer> sto,List<Integer> cost  ){\n        \n          int consume = 0;\n            for(int j=0; j<com.size(); j++){\n               \n                if(sto.get(j)>=com.get(j)){\n                    sto.set(j, sto.get(j)-com.get(j));\n                }else if(sto.get(j)==0){\n                    consume += com.get(j)*cost.get(j);\n                }else if(sto.get(j)<com.get(j)){\n                   \n                    consume += (com.get(j)-sto.get(j))*cost.get(j);\n                    sto.set(j, 0);\n                }\n            }\n        \n        return consume;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-number-of-alloys","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
